revision.text: {{Talk header}} {{ArticleHistory |action1=GAN |action1date=23:40, 31 March 2015 (UTC) |action1link=/GA1 |action1result=promoted |action1oldid=654416076 |action2=GTC |action2date=01:08, 4 July 2015 (UTC) |action2link=Wikipedia:Featured topic candidates/Hrabri-class submarines/archive1 |action2result=promoted |action3=WAR |action3date=03:07, 27 September 2015 (UTC) |action3link=Wikipedia:WikiProject Military history/Assessment/Yugoslav submarine Nebojša |action3result=approved |action3oldid=682359472 |ftname=Hrabri-class submarines |currentstatus=FA |topic=Warfare |action4=FAC |action4date=2015-10-31 |action4link=Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/Yugoslav submarine Nebojša/archive1 |action4result=promoted |action4oldid=688160477 }} {{Australian English}} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Yugoslavia|class = FA|importance=low}} {{WPMILHIST|class = FA|A-Class=pass | B1 = y | B2 = y | B3 = y | B4 = y | B5 = y |Maritime=y|Balkan=y|WWII=y}} {{WPSHIPS|class = FA|B1=y|B2=y|B3=y|B4=y|B5=y}} }} ==Clarification== G'day, Peacemaker, I think there is a minor discrepancy in the article. In the body it says "Her surfaced displacement was 1,164 long tons (1,183 t) (1,164 long tons (1,183 t) submerged)", but in the infobox it says "Displacement: 975 long tons (991 t) (surfaced) 1,164 long tons (1,183 t) (submerged)". Could you please clarify which is correct (I think it is the infobox, but I'm only guessing). Otherwise I think the article would rate as C class (it probably needs more coverage of service history: for instance what happened between 1927 and 1941, and did she see any action while attached to the British submarine flotillas?) Regards, [[User:AustralianRupert|AustralianRupert]] ([[User talk:AustralianRupert|talk]]) 10:38, 20 October 2013 (UTC) :G'day, I've just adjusted this myself. Please check that I have corrected the right information as I am only guessing based on the infobox. Regards, [[User:AustralianRupert|AustralianRupert]] ([[User talk:AustralianRupert|talk]]) 01:06, 27 October 2013 (UTC) ::Sorry AR, got distracted with something else. You are right. 975 surfaced, 1164 submerged. Thanks, [[User:Peacemaker67|Peacemaker67]] ([[User_talk:Peacemaker67#top|send... over]]) 01:13, 27 October 2013 (UTC) :::No worries, have a good one. Regards, [[User:AustralianRupert|AustralianRupert]] ([[User talk:AustralianRupert|talk]]) 01:39, 27 October 2013 (UTC) == 8 days at sea? == According to {{cite book | last = Divine | first = A. D. | year = 1944 | title = Navies in Exile | publisher = E. P. Dutton | location = New York | pages = 207–09 }}, ''Nebojša'' left Kotor after 1800 hours on 17 April and arrived in Suda Bay on 24 April. [[User:Srnec|Srnec]] ([[User talk:Srnec|talk]]) 00:16, 6 April 2015 (UTC) :that is eight calendar days, is it not? [[User:Peacemaker67|Peacemaker67]] ([[User_talk:Peacemaker67#top|crack... thump]]) 00:56, 6 April 2015 (UTC) ::It is, but the article currently says that it arrived in Crete on 23 April and I did not interpret "eight days at sea" to mean eight calendar days (I took it to mean roughly 192 hours at sea). I don't have access to the sources cited in the article, so I can't check to see why the discrepancy or who's in error. That's why I just posted the information and didn't speculate. [[User:Srnec|Srnec]] ([[User talk:Srnec|talk]]) 02:00, 6 April 2015 (UTC) :::Thanks, I doubt it was meant to be that exact, but I will look at some sources and add some clarity of I can find it. Cheers, [[User:Peacemaker67|Peacemaker67]] ([[User_talk:Peacemaker67#top|crack... thump]]) 02:11, 6 April 2015 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just added archive links to {{plural:4|one external link|4 external links}} on [[Yugoslav submarine Nebojša]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=712820323 my edit]. You may add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it, if I keep adding bad data, but formatting bugs should be reported instead. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether, but should be used as a last resort. I made the following changes: *Attempted to fix sourcing for http://www.blic.rs/Vesti/Beograd/246267/Deo-stuke-i-zastava-sa-podmornice-Nebojsa-u-Vojnom-muzeju *Attempted to fix sourcing for http://www.vijesti.me/vijesti/85-godina-dolaska-prvih-jugoslovenskih-podmornica-clanak-122013 *Attempted to fix sourcing for http://www.novosti.rs/vesti/naslovna/aktuelno.69.html:323768-Preminuo-poslednji-cuvar-srpske-podmornice *Attempted to fix sourcing for http://radiotivat.com/index.php/zdravlje/33-tivat-kroz-novinsku-gradju/9439-tivat-kroz-novinsku-gradju-9-jul.html When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=failed}} Cheers.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]][[User talk:Cyberbot II|Talk to my owner]]:Online 08:34, 31 March 2016 (UTC)
